scripts.test:pullrequest: filenames=$((for dir in `git --no-pager diff --name-only FETCH_HEAD $(git merge-base FETCH_HEAD master)`; do dirname $dir; done) | sort -u | paste -s -d, -); npm test -- --input $filenames
scripts.test: for dir in sources/*; do echo "$dir"; node bin/run_recipe --input "$dir" --debug 10 --validate --silent; done
